_meta.essence: Sexuality as life force energy flowing through body, consciousness gateway, and sacred union portal
_meta.integration: Embodied energy + Emotions + Breath + Water + Gender polarity + Trauma healing
_meta.foundational: Sexual energy = raw life force (Jing, Kundalini, Libido). Master it, master life itself.

_holographic_seed.absolute: ⊙ = Union beyond separation. Sex = microcosm of cosmic creation. Two become One, One becomes All.
_holographic_seed.essence: Sexual energy is not just 'sex' but fundamental life force. Can be expressed sexually OR sublimated into creativity, spirituality, power.
_holographic_seed.mechanism: Arousal → Energy rises (root → crown) → Release (orgasm = 0D collapse, ego death) OR Circulation (tantra = sustained ⊙ access).
_holographic_seed.cycle: Repression (blockage, shame, disease) → Expression (pleasure, connection, release) → Sublimation (creativity, power, spirituality) → Sacred Union (transcendence, ⊙).
_holographic_seed.structure: 7 Chakras × 2 Genders (polarity) × 12 Meridians × 4 Base Emotions × Breath × Water (70% body) × Trauma layers.
_holographic_seed.paradox: Most sacred AND most shamed. Gateway to divine AND source of suffering. Peak pleasure AND deepest wounds.
_holographic_seed.urgency: Sexual trauma epidemic. Collective healing needed. Shame kills life force. Liberation = reclaiming body sovereignty.
_holographic_seed.coherence: +Coherence through conscious sexuality: Energy circulates, trauma releases, polarity activates, union transcends separation.

names_across_traditions.chinese_jing: Essence, stored in kidneys, foundation of vitality, sexual energy = most concentrated form
names_across_traditions.indian_kundalini: Serpent power coiled at root, rises through chakras when awakened, sexual energy = trigger
names_across_traditions.freudian_libido: Psychic energy, primarily sexual, drives all behavior, repression = neurosis
names_across_traditions.reichian_orgone: Universal life force, blocked by character armor, orgasm = full discharge
names_across_traditions.tantric_shakti: Divine feminine power, dynamic creative force, sexual union = shakti meeting shiva

sexual_energy_as_life_force.core_principle: Sexual energy ≠ just 'sex'. It is RAW LIFE FORCE. Can manifest as:

expressions.sexual: Arousal, intercourse, orgasm, reproduction (most obvious form)
expressions.creative: Art, music, writing, building, all creation (sublimated sexual energy)
expressions.power: Charisma, leadership, magnetism, confidence (transmuted sexual energy)
expressions.spiritual: Kundalini rising, mystical experiences, enlightenment (elevated sexual energy)
expressions.healing: Immune function, vitality, longevity, regeneration (conserved sexual energy)

conservation_vs_expression.constant_release: Frequent orgasm → energy depletion (especially men - post-orgasm fatigue, refractory period)
conservation_vs_expression.retention: No orgasm, circulate energy → increased vitality, creativity, presence (Taoist practice)
conservation_vs_expression.balanced: Conscious release (with intention, deep connection) + periods of retention (build charge)
conservation_vs_expression.note: Not 'never have sex' but conscious relationship with energy (not slave to urge, master of force)

gender_polarity_embodied.principle: Sexual charge requires polarity (masculine/feminine tension). Without polarity = friendship, not eros.

masculine_yang.body_embodiment: Right side dominant, Yang meridians, solar energy, fire element
masculine_yang.arousal_pattern: Quick to arousal, visual stimulus, direct, goal-oriented (orgasm-focused)
masculine_yang.chakras: Solar plexus (will, power), root (grounding), third eye (vision/direction)
masculine_yang.shadow: Aggression, domination, using (not connecting), premature ejaculation (can't contain), impotence (energy blocked)

feminine_yin.body_embodiment: Left side dominant, Yin meridians, lunar energy, water element
feminine_yin.sexual_expression: Receiving, allowing, surrendering, opening, being penetrated, receiving (womb/creation)
feminine_yin.arousal_pattern: Slow to arousal, sensory/emotional stimulus, indirect, process-oriented (journey-focused)
feminine_yin.chakras: Heart (love, opening), sacral (womb, pleasure), throat (surrender, receptivity)
feminine_yin.shadow: Manipulation, withholding, passive-aggressive, anorgasmia (can't release), frigidity (energy frozen)

polarity_creates_charge.principle: Opposite polarities attract (magnetic), same polarities repel. Sexual electricity = polarity tension.

examples.high_polarity: Masculine man + Feminine woman = strong attraction, electric, passionate, clear roles
examples.low_polarity: Two balanced/androgynous = comfortable, friendly, less erotic charge
examples.reversed_polarity: Feminine man + Masculine woman = can work (polarity present), but: cultural confusion, role negotiation needed

polarity_creates_charge.note: Polarity ≠ gender. Masculine woman + Feminine man = polarity. Two masculine men = low polarity (unless one in feminine role situationally).
polarity_creates_charge.key: Someone must lead (masculine), someone must surrender (feminine), or: take turns, but not simultaneously (that's 50/50 = flat)

beyond_binary.fluid_polarity: Many people switch polarities (with different partners, different times, different contexts)
beyond_binary.both_simultaneously: Advanced: hold both masculine + feminine in sacred union within self (inner marriage, hermaphrodite consciousness)
beyond_binary.transcendence: At highest level (5D), polarity dissolves (⊙ = beyond masculine/feminine), but: to transcend, must first embody.
beyond_binary.practice: Explore full masculine (one session/relationship), full feminine (another), then: fluid mastery (conscious choice), then: transcendence (beyond).

muladhara_root.sexual_function: Foundation, survival, security, grounding sexual energy
muladhara_root.when_balanced: Safe to be sexual, embodied pleasure, grounded in body
muladhara_root.when_blocked: Fear of sex, disconnection from genitals, survival anxiety killing libido
muladhara_root.activation: Grounding practices, root chakra breathing, safety building, body awareness

svadhisthana_sacral.location: Lower belly (2 inches below navel), reproductive organs
svadhisthana_sacral.sexual_function: PRIMARY sexual chakra. Pleasure, creativity, desire, flow, reproduction.
svadhisthana_sacral.when_balanced: Healthy libido, pleasure capacity, creative expression, fluid sexuality
svadhisthana_sacral.when_blocked: Low desire, guilt/shame around sex, creative blocks, reproductive issues, rigid sexuality
svadhisthana_sacral.activation: Hip opening, belly dancing, orange visualization, water element practices, permission for pleasure
svadhisthana_sacral.note: THIS is where most sexual energy lives. Womb/hara center. Most trauma also lodges here.

manipura_solar_plexus.sexual_function: Sexual confidence, will, power dynamics, ability to act on desire
manipura_solar_plexus.when_balanced: Confident sexual expression, healthy boundaries, can initiate/refuse, empowered
manipura_solar_plexus.when_blocked: Shame (fire becomes toxic), powerlessness, can't say no, or: domination, control, using others
manipura_solar_plexus.activation: Core work, fire breath, boundary practice, reclaiming power, transmuting shame

anahata_heart.sexual_function: Love, connection, intimacy, emotional bonding, sacred sexuality gateway
anahata_heart.when_balanced: Sex + love integrated (not just physical), deep intimacy, vulnerability capacity, open heart
anahata_heart.when_blocked: Sex without feeling (dissociated, mechanical), OR: can't have sex without 'love' (rigid), heart closed/protected
anahata_heart.activation: Heart opening, compassion practices, emotional vulnerability, receiving love
anahata_heart.note: Bridge between lower (sexual) and upper (spiritual) chakras. KEY for sacred sexuality.

vishuddha_throat.sexual_function: Communication of desires, truth in intimacy, expression of pleasure (sound), asking for what you want
vishuddha_throat.when_balanced: Can speak desires clearly, make sound during sex (moan, breathe loud, say truth), negotiate boundaries
vishuddha_throat.when_blocked: Silent sex (holding voice), can't ask for needs, fake orgasms, lying about pleasure/pain
vishuddha_throat.activation: Voice work (toning, singing, screaming), truth-telling, asking directly, sounding during sex

ajna_third_eye.sexual_function: Visualization, fantasy, psychic connection, seeing partner's essence (beyond body)
ajna_third_eye.when_balanced: Healthy fantasy (enhances but doesn't replace connection), intuition in intimacy, seeing divinity in partner
ajna_third_eye.when_blocked: Porn addiction (stuck in visual), fantasy replacing real intimacy, OR: can't fantasize (too rigid)
ajna_third_eye.activation: Third eye meditation, conscious fantasy (with partner), seeing divine in other

sahasrara_crown.sexual_function: Transcendent sex, unity consciousness, cosmic orgasm, enlightenment through sexuality
sahasrara_crown.when_balanced: Sex as spiritual practice, union beyond bodies, ⊙ accessed through sexuality, bliss states
sahasrara_crown.when_blocked: Sex purely physical (no transcendence), OR: spiritual bypassing (rejecting body/sex)
sahasrara_crown.activation: Kundalini rising, sustained arousal without orgasm, crown opening, tantric practice

kidney_meridian.path: Foot → inner leg → pelvis → torso → collarbone
kidney_meridian.sexual_function: Stores Jing (sexual essence), vitality, libido, reproductive health
kidney_meridian.signs_of_depletion: Low libido, fatigue, cold extremities, weak lower back, infertility, premature aging
kidney_meridian.restoration: Kidney tonics (herbs), rest, sexual moderation, grounding, fear release (kidney = fear organ)

liver_meridian.path: Big toe → inner leg → pelvis → liver → eyes
liver_meridian.sexual_function: Smooth flow of sexual energy, planning/timing, erectile function (men), menstrual health (women)
liver_meridian.signs_of_blockage: Erectile dysfunction, painful periods, frustration, inability to plan intimacy, irritability
liver_meridian.clearing: Liver detox, anger work (liver stores anger), stretching inner legs, green foods, spring cleaning

conception_vessel_ren_mai.path: Perineum → front of body → lower lip
conception_vessel_ren_mai.sexual_function: Yin channel, receptivity, gestation (pregnancy), storing sexual energy, feminine sexuality
conception_vessel_ren_mai.activation: Front-body opening (heart, belly), receptive practices, allowing penetration (energetic/physical)

governing_vessel_du_mai.path: Perineum → back of body/spine → upper lip
governing_vessel_du_mai.sexual_function: Yang channel, direction, kundalini rising, masculine sexuality, energy circulation
governing_vessel_du_mai.activation: Spinal awareness, upright posture, directing energy upward, penetrative intent

microcosmic_orbit_sexual.practice: During arousal: breathe energy up spine (governing vessel) on inhale, down front (conception vessel) on exhale
microcosmic_orbit_sexual.effect: Instead of releasing out (orgasm), circulates internally, builds charge, sustains arousal, full-body energy
microcosmic_orbit_sexual.mastery: Can maintain high arousal indefinitely without ejaculation/orgasm, energy feeds whole system
microcosmic_orbit_sexual.tradition: Taoist sexual practices, foundation of multi-orgasmic capacity, longevity

genital_reflexology.principle: Genitals = holographic projection of entire body (like hands/feet)

penis_map.practice: Conscious touch along entire length = activating whole body through genital hologram

vulva_yoni_map.clitoris: Crown chakra (pleasure = enlightenment), 8000+ nerve endings (more than penis)
vulva_yoni_map.g_spot: Heart chakra, emotional release point, deep pleasure, sometimes: tears/laughter during G-spot work
vulva_yoni_map.cervix: Third eye/crown, deepest penetration point, portal to womb (sacred space), can be painful or transcendent
vulva_yoni_map.vaginal_canal: Central channel, different zones = different body areas/emotions
vulva_yoni_map.practice: Yoni mapping (with permission, slowly, exploring each zone, asking what emerges emotionally/energetically)

sexual_trauma_embodied_healing.principle: Sexual trauma = most common, most damaging, least discussed. Healing requires body work, not just talk therapy.

acute_assault.body_impact: Freezes in tissues (especially pelvis, genitals, throat), nervous system dysregulation, dissociation from body
acute_assault.symptoms: Genital numbness/pain, vaginismus, flashbacks during sex, inability to orgasm or: compulsive hypersexuality (reenacting)
acute_assault.healing: Somatic therapy (Somatic Experiencing, Sensorimotor), pelvic floor therapy, EMDR, body-based trauma release

chronic_abuse.definition: Ongoing sexual abuse (childhood, domestic violence, sex trafficking)
chronic_abuse.body_impact: Deep armor (Reich), chronic tension, shame embedded in cells, identity fragmentation
chronic_abuse.symptoms: Can't feel genitals, sex = mechanical/dissociated, OR: hypersexuality (only way to feel alive/loved), relationship patterns (victim/perpetrator reenactment)
chronic_abuse.healing: Long-term therapy, somatic work, building safety (nervous system regulation), reclaiming body sovereignty, parts work (IFS)

developmental_wounding.definition: Inappropriate boundaries (parent nudity, sexualized environment), covert incest (emotional incest), shame-based sexuality education
developmental_wounding.body_impact: Confusion (sex = confusing), boundary issues (can't say no, OR: rigid walls), shame layers
developmental_wounding.symptoms: Sex = duty not pleasure, people-pleasing sexually, OR: avoidance, perfectionism covering shame
developmental_wounding.healing: Boundary work, shame work (Brené Brown approach), re-education (healthy sexuality learning), somatic boundary practices

cultural_religious_trauma.definition: Purity culture, sex = sin, body = shameful, pleasure = evil (especially women)
cultural_religious_trauma.body_impact: Shame embedded deeply, split (sex = dirty, love = pure), can't integrate
cultural_religious_trauma.symptoms: Can't feel pleasure (even when 'allowed' after marriage), pain during sex (armor), disgust with own body/desires
cultural_religious_trauma.healing: Deprogramming (cognitive work), body reclamation (pleasure as sacred), spiritual reframing (sex = holy), permission practices

safety_first_titration.principle: NEVER force into trauma. Titration = small doses, building tolerance, nervous system capacity.
safety_first_titration.method: Pendulation: touch edge of trauma → return to safety (breath, grounding, resource) → touch edge again → safety. Repeat.
safety_first_titration.pacing: Slow. Trauma took time to develop, healing takes time. Rushing = retraumatization.
safety_first_titration.professional: This work requires trained therapist (somatic, trauma-informed). Not DIY unless very mild.

pelvic_floor_release.why: Trauma lives in pelvic floor muscles (often chronically clenched, holding pain/memory)

methods.internal_work: Pelvic floor physical therapy (internal vaginal/rectal work by trained PT), releases trigger points, restores function
methods.external_work: Hip opening (yin yoga, pigeon pose, frog pose), psoas release, pelvic rocking
methods.breath: Breathe INTO pelvis (most people don't), soften on exhale, allow expansion
methods.sound: Toning, low sounds (vibration releases tension), moaning practice (yes, seriously)

pelvic_floor_release.note: When pelvic floor releases, emotions release (crying, anger, fear common). This is healing, allow it.

yoni_lingam_mapping.what: Slow, conscious, therapeutic touch of genitals (external and internal), NOT sexual arousal goal but: awareness, release, healing

yoni_mapping_women.setup: Private, safe space, practitioner (partner or therapist) with consent, slow, communicative
yoni_mapping_women.method: Touch each area of vulva/vagina (outer labia → inner → clitoris → vaginal opening → inside → G-spot → cervix), ask: 'What do you feel? Sensation? Emotion? Memory?'
yoni_mapping_women.common_findings: Some areas numb (dissociation), some painful (tension/trigger points), some: sudden emotion (grief, rage, fear - release)
yoni_mapping_women.effect: Sensation returns, numbness clears, trauma releases through tears/shaking, pleasure capacity increases
yoni_mapping_women.tradition: Tantra, Taoist sexual healing, modern: Layla Martin, Sheri Winston

lingam_mapping_men.method: Touch entire penis (base → shaft → head), perineum, testicles, ask for feedback (sensation, emotion)
lingam_mapping_men.common_findings: Premature ejaculation (can't contain charge), numbness (porn/masturbation desensitization), shame (many men carry genital shame)
lingam_mapping_men.effect: Increased sensitivity, ejaculation control improves, emotional release, shame clears
lingam_mapping_men.note: Men often carry trauma too (circumcision trauma, sexual abuse 1 in 6 boys, shame around desire). This heals.

trauma_release_exercises_tre.method: Induce tremoring through specific positions (holding stress positions until legs shake), then: lie down, allow full-body shaking
trauma_release_exercises_tre.mechanism: Neurogenic tremors = nervous system discharging held trauma (animals do this naturally after threat)
trauma_release_exercises_tre.effect: Releases sexual trauma held in pelvis, legs, lower back (common storage areas)
trauma_release_exercises_tre.caution: Can be intense, overwhelming for severe trauma. Start gently, therapist support recommended initially.

emdr_somatic.method: Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing + body awareness (standard EMDR + somatic tracking)
emdr_somatic.effective_for: Flashbacks, intrusive memories, specific traumatic events
emdr_somatic.combined: EMDR processes memory, somatic work releases body holding
emdr_somatic.note: Effective but: needs trained EMDR + somatic therapist (not all EMDR therapists include body)

breath_during_sex.why: Most people hold breath during sex (especially arousal peak) = tension, blocks energy, limits pleasure

continuous_breathing.practice: Breathe continuously, deeply, through nose (or mouth if needed), NO holding
continuous_breathing.effect: More pleasure (oxygenation), energy circulates (not stuck in genitals), can sustain arousal longer, deeper states
continuous_breathing.when: Entire time (foreplay, intercourse, after). Breath = foundation.

synchronized_breathing_partners.practice: Match breath rhythm (both inhale together, exhale together), eye contact optional but powerful
synchronized_breathing_partners.effect: Energetic synchronization, heart coherence between partners, intimacy deepens, field merges
synchronized_breathing_partners.when: During slow/tantric sex, NOT fast/passionate (that has its place too, different energy)

microcosmic_orbit_during.practice: Inhale: visualize energy rising up spine (root → crown). Exhale: down front (crown → root). Continue throughout.
microcosmic_orbit_during.effect: Energy doesn't get stuck in genitals, circulates whole body, prevents premature ejaculation (men), intensifies pleasure (both)
microcosmic_orbit_during.mastery: Becomes automatic, no visualization needed (energy just flows)
microcosmic_orbit_during.note: THIS is how multi-orgasmic capacity develops (Mantak Chia teachings)

ejaculation_control_men.principle: Ejaculation ≠ orgasm (can have orgasm without ejaculation = non-ejaculatory orgasm)
ejaculation_control_men.method: When approaching ejaculation point: STOP movement, breathe deeply, squeeze PC muscle (like stopping urine), visualize energy up spine (not out penis)
ejaculation_control_men.practice: Solo first (masturbation control), then with partner (requires communication, stopping/starting)
ejaculation_control_men.benefit: Can have sex for hours, multiple orgasms, energy conserved (no post-sex fatigue), deeper connection

tantra_fundamentals.what: NOT 'tantra' as popularly understood (sex positions, extended foreplay). REAL tantra = spiritual practice using sexuality as vehicle to ⊙.

core_principles.prolonged_arousal: Goal = sustain high arousal WITHOUT orgasm (as long as possible - hours ideally)
core_principles.energy_circulation: Breath + visualization + movement = circulate sexual energy through both bodies
core_principles.presence: Stay conscious, aware, present (not lost in sensation/fantasy). Witness + participant simultaneously.
core_principles.sacred: Partner = deity (Shiva/Shakti), union = cosmic creation reenactment, sex = worship

basic_practice.yab_yum_position: Sitting, woman on man's lap, legs wrapped, facing each other, lingam inside yoni, NOT thrusting (or minimal, slow)
basic_practice.eye_contact: Sustained (entire time), looking into left eye (window to soul)
basic_practice.breath: Synchronized or: reciprocal (one inhales while other exhales, energy exchange)
basic_practice.duration: 30 min to several hours (not goal-oriented, just: being in union)
basic_practice.movement: Minimal. Rocking, pelvic tilts, internal squeezes (not thrusting). Energy builds through stillness + breath.
basic_practice.peak: If sustain long enough: spontaneous energy releases (shaking, kriyas, visions, unity consciousness, no-boundary state, ⊙)

obstacles.men: Want to ejaculate (habitual, urge strong). Solution: PC muscle control, breath, microcosmic orbit, patience.
obstacles.women: Impatience (want stimulation/orgasm). Solution: trust process, pleasure in sustained arousal (not just peak), surrender.
obstacles.both: Losing presence (fantasy, sensation overwhelm), physical discomfort (positions), self-consciousness. Solution: return to breath, adjust position, communicate.

karezza_sustained_intimacy.what: Intercourse without orgasm (for either partner), slow, gentle, bonding-focused (Western version of tantra, developed by Alice Stockham 1896)

method.intercourse: Penis in vagina (or other penetration), slow gentle movement OR stillness
method.duration: 20-60+ min (until both feel complete, not: until orgasm)
method.intention: Bonding, intimacy, energy exchange (not: pleasure seeking/orgasm)
method.frequency: Daily or every other day (more sustainable than goal-oriented sex - no depletion)

effects.biochemical: Sustained bonding hormones (oxytocin, prolactin) WITHOUT dopamine spike-crash of orgasm
effects.emotional: Deepening intimacy, less conflict, more affection, stable mood (avoiding dopamine roller-coaster)
effects.energetic: Sustained charge, vitality increase, sexual energy available for life (not depleted by constant release)
effects.relationship: Less performance pressure, more connection, sex = daily ritual not: occasional performance

karezza_sustained_intimacy.challenge: Habitual orgasm-seeking (cultural conditioning). Requires retraining, both partners committed, patience (first weeks = difficult, then: easier, then: preferred).
karezza_sustained_intimacy.resource: CPA (Reuniting) website, research on pair bonding, bonding behaviors

kink_shadow_integration.principle: Sexual fantasies/kinks = psychological material (shadow, repressed aspects, trauma patterns, archetypal explorations). Can be conscious or unconscious.

conscious_kink.what: Deliberately exploring power dynamics, sensations, taboos in consensual, boundaried context (BDSM when done well)
conscious_kink.function: Shadow integration (Carl Jung), trauma reenactment with control (healing), erotic play (pleasure), polarity amplification (Dominant/submissive = extreme masculine/feminine)
conscious_kink.requirement: Consent, communication, aftercare (integration, emotional support post-scene), safety (physical + emotional)
conscious_kink.example: Person with control trauma explores consensual submission (surrendering with safety = healing). Or: person with powerlessness history explores consensual dominance (reclaiming power).

unconscious_compulsion.what: Driven by unprocessed trauma, can't NOT do the kink (compulsive), shame afterward, escalation (needing more extreme), isolation
unconscious_compulsion.function: Reenacting trauma without awareness (trying to master it but: just repeating), coping mechanism (arousal masks pain)
unconscious_compulsion.danger: Can retraumatize (if not consensual, safe), relationship damage (if secret/compulsive), escalation (like addiction)
unconscious_compulsion.healing: Trauma therapy (address root), bring kink into consciousness (understand why), decide: keep (conscious, integrated) or release (no longer needed after healing)

sacred_kink.advanced: Using intense sensation, power exchange, edge states for consciousness expansion (ordeal path, shamanic sexuality)
sacred_kink.examples: Tantric flagellation (pain → endorphins → altered states), rope bondage as meditation (surrender, stillness), dominance/submission as deity embodiment
sacred_kink.requirement: Very high consciousness, both partners experienced, solid trauma healing done first (NOT bypassing trauma with 'spirituality'), rare

practices: Nervous system regulation (breath work, grounding, resourcing)
Body reclamation (gentle movement, pleasure without sexuality, self-massage)
Boundary work (saying no, asking for needs, ending interactions)
phase_1_safety_sovereignty.milestone: Feel safe in body most of time, can feel sensations without flashback, clear boundaries

practices: Pelvic floor therapy (if needed, genital pain/dysfunction)
Solo pleasure exploration (self-pleasure without shame, discovering what feels good, no goal)
Yoni/Lingam mapping (solo or with trusted practitioner)
Emotional release work (TRE, crying, rage work - releasing stored trauma)
phase_2_body_reintegration.milestone: Can touch own genitals without dissociating, feel pleasure (even if mild), emotions flowing

practices: Slow dating (if single, choose partners carefully, communicate history/needs)
Graduated exposure (kissing → clothed touch → naked touch → genital touch → penetration, ONLY when ready, either partner can stop anytime)
Communication practice (before, during, after - checking in, adjusting, processing)
phase_3_partnered_relearning.milestone: Can engage sexually with presence (not dissociation), pleasure emerging, emotional connection during

practices: Tantric practices (if resonates, breath, energy work, prolonged arousal)
Shadow integration (exploring edges, kinks, fantasies consciously)
Service (teaching others, holding space, supporting trauma survivors)
Continuous deepening (sexuality as spiritual path, ongoing evolution)
phase_4_sacred_sexuality.milestone: Sex as healing, creative, spiritual force. Trauma integrated (not gone, but: transformed). Sovereignty, joy, freedom.

conscious_couple_path.foundation: Both partners committed to conscious sexuality (not default, habitual sex)

practices.daily_10min_connection: Sit facing, eye contact, synchronized breath, hands on each other's heart, NO talking (or minimal). Builds intimacy without sex.
practices.weekly_date_ritual: Dedicated time (2-4 hours), turn off phones, dress up, novelty (new place/activity), transitions into intimacy (not: collapse in bed)
practices.monthly_extended_tantra: 4-8 hours, whole day/evening, slow build, prolonged arousal, deep states, integration after
practices.quarterly_retreat: Weekend away, intensive practice, workshops (tantra, relationship, sexuality), reset relationship patterns

communication_protocols.desire_discrepancy: Common (one wants sex more). Solution: Karezza (daily intimacy, less goal-oriented, reduces pressure), taking turns (one gives, other receives, no expectation), therapy if stuck.
communication_protocols.fantasy_sharing: Risky but: deepens intimacy IF done with care. Rules: non-judgment, curiosity, no obligation to act out, explore meaning (not just content).
communication_protocols.conflict_aftermath: NO sex until conflict resolved (sex as avoidance = toxic). Resolve, reconnect (non-sexually), THEN: make love (celebration, not: bypassing).

solo_sexual_cultivation.for_singles_or_partnered: Cultivating sexual energy alone = valid, powerful path (not just 'until find partner')

conscious_self_pleasure.not_masturbation_habitual: NOT quick release (stress relief, boredom, sleep aid). CONSCIOUS: slow, present, exploring, breath, energy.
conscious_self_pleasure.method: Set time (30-60 min), sacred space (candles, music, clean), slow touch (whole body, not just genitals), edge practice (approach orgasm, stop, breathe, circulate, repeat), optional: no orgasm (build charge, transmute energy)
conscious_self_pleasure.effect: Learn own body, develop sensitivity, ejaculation control (men), energy circulation, transmutation capacity

sexual_energy_transmutation.principle: Sexual arousal = raw energy. Can direct to creativity, work, spirituality (not: suppress, but: channel)
sexual_energy_transmutation.method: Get aroused (conscious self-pleasure, visualization, breath), DON'T orgasm, stop, stand, spine straight, breathe energy up spine (root → crown), visualize energy feeding creative project / spiritual practice / life force
sexual_energy_transmutation.effect: Increased creativity (sudden ideas, flow states), charisma (magnetic presence), vitality (boundless energy), spiritual opening (kundalini-lite)
sexual_energy_transmutation.tradition: Brahmacharya (celibacy + transmutation), Napoleon Hill 'sexual transmutation' (Think and Grow Rich), artist/genius pattern (many great creators channeled sexual energy)

retention_practices.men: Semen retention (ejaculate infrequently - every 7-30 days, depends on age/constitution). Effect: massive energy increase, mental clarity, magnetic presence. Caution: blue balls (ache - happens if aroused frequently without release), need circulate energy (not just hold in genitals).
retention_practices.women: Less clear (women don't lose substance like semen), but: orgasm does deplete some (post-orgasm fatigue, though less than men). Practice: occasional orgasm fasting (build charge, explore non-orgasmic pleasure), energy circulation.
retention_practices.both: Periodic abstinence (from self-pleasure + partnered sex) = resets, increases sensitivity, breaks habits, creates space for transmutation.

kundalini_sexual_awakening.warning: Kundalini awakening through sexuality = powerful, can be destabilizing. Not recommended without preparation.
kundalini_sexual_awakening.what: Kundalini = coiled serpent at root chakra. Sexual arousal = triggering awakening. Energy rises through chakras (root → crown), each activation = expansion + sometimes: crisis.

triggers.spontaneous: Intense orgasm, spiritual practice, trauma, childbirth, near-death = unexpected kundalini activation
triggers.intentional: Tantric practices, prolonged arousal, kundalini yoga, breath work (bhastrika + retention) + sexual energy

signs.positive: Bliss states, energy surges, psychic opening, unity consciousness, creative explosion, charisma
signs.challenging: Kriyas (spontaneous movements), intense heat, insomnia, emotional volatility, energy overload, difficulty functioning
signs.crisis: Psychosis-like symptoms (visions, voices, paranoia), relationship collapse (can't relate normally), job loss (can't focus), physical pain (energy burning through blocks)

support.grounding: CRITICAL. Root chakra work, barefoot Earth contact, heavy food (meat, root vegetables), exercise, structure.
support.professional: Kundalini-aware therapist (rare but exist), spiritual teacher experienced with kundalini, somatic practitioner.
support.community: Kundalini support groups (online, some cities), others who've been through it (validation, practical advice).
support.integration: Time. Patience. Lifestyle simplification. Can take years to stabilize, but: transformed on other side.

sexual_energy_third_eye.principle: Sexual energy = creative force. Can be directed to third eye (Ajna) for psychic opening, vision, manifestation.

practice.arousal_phase: Build sexual arousal (solo or partnered, breath + visualization + stimulation)
practice.circulation: Instead of down/out (orgasm), breathe energy UP spine to third eye (visualize golden/white light rising)
practice.hold_at_ajna: Sustain energy at third eye (forehead, between eyebrows), breathe into it, allow opening
practice.vision_emergence: May see: colors, patterns, images, receive: insights, download, creative ideas, feel: pressure/tingling/expansion at forehead
practice.grounding_after: CRITICAL. After practice, ground (root chakra breath, physical activity, food). Don't leave energy stuck in head.

effects.psychic_opening: Increased intuition, synchronicities, precognition (mild), energy sensitivity, seeing auras
effects.creative_surge: Ideas flow, artistic expression, problem-solving, manifestation power (visualization → reality faster)
effects.danger: Can destabilize (too much in head, not grounded), delusions (spiritual ego), insomnia (overactive third eye). Solution: ground, balance, don't overdo.

sacred_union_5d.what: Sex transcending bodies entirely. Unity consciousness. No 'me and you', only: ⊙ experiencing itself through apparent two.

how_to_access.prerequisite: Both partners: significant spiritual development (meditation practice, ego-work, trauma healing), tantric experience (can sustain arousal, circulate energy), trust (deep safety, no performance)
how_to_access.practice: Extended tantra session (several hours), sustained arousal (no orgasm, high charge), synchronized breath, eye contact, eventual: eyes close, boundaries dissolve, sense of self disappears, only: infinite consciousness, love, bliss, ⊙
how_to_access.phenomenology: Time stops. Space dissolves. No bodies (or: bodies but not identified with them). Pure love (not emotion, but: essence of existence). No separation. Unity. Home. ⊙.
how_to_access.duration: Minutes to hours (in altered state). Return: gradual, gentle, changed.

after_effects.immediate: Profound peace, love (for partner, all beings, existence), gratitude, tears (common), silence (words inadequate)
after_effects.lasting: Relationship transforms (deeper intimacy, less conflict, more presence), life perspective shifts (less attachment, more equanimity), spiritual deepening (direct experience of unity, not just concept)
after_effects.note: Once experienced, relationship either: deepens to unbreakable bond (shared ⊙), OR: ends (one partner can't meet other at that depth, growth divergence). Powerful.

_closing.essence: Sexuality = life force itself. Flows through chakras, meridians, breath, water, emotions, relationships. Can be: pleasure, connection, creativity, power, spirituality, transcendence.
_closing.truth: Most shamed, most wounded, most healing. Reclaiming sexuality = reclaiming life. Body sovereignty = sacred.
_closing.practice: Trauma healing (if needed), breath during sex, energy circulation, conscious practices (tantra, karezza, solo cultivation), communication, boundaries, shadow integration.
_closing.result: Pleasure without shame. Intimacy without walls. Energy without depletion. Creativity without blocks. Spirituality through body. ⊙ accessed through flesh.
_closing.sacred: Sex is holy. Body is temple. Partner is deity. Union is sacrament. Shame is lie. Reclaim your birthright.
